as one of the most underrated sequels of all time quake 4 gives off an amazing continuation to the quake ii story and bringing an amazing shooter with beautiful visuals audio characters plot atmosphere difficulty etc  despite it being the weakest of the singleplayer quakes it is still very much worth it if you are looking for a call of duty alternative and also a continuation of quake ii that ending still makes me wonder and shake in my shoes to this day
